Pre-Game Insights: Hassan Bandé and his teammates are confident but respectful towards the Burundian team ahead of the crucial match for CAN 2025 qualification.
Hassan Bandé emphasized that the upcoming match will be different from the first encounter where Burundi lost 4-1, noting that Burundi will be a more prepared and challenging opponent.
The Burkinabè team aims to win and bring joy to their supporters, with a focus on maintaining confidence without underestimating their opponents.
